news.title: Streeting orders review into rising demand for mental health and ADHD services
news.summary: The review will look at increased pressure on the NHS and whether there is any evidence of over-diagnosis.

news.title: UK and Norway form naval alliance to hunt Russian submarines
news.summary: The partnership is designed to protect undersea cables, which Western officials say are increasingly under threat from Moscow.

news.title: Oil, defence and geopolitics: Why Putin is visiting Modi in Delhi
news.summary: BBC editors explain what is at stake as Russian President Vladimir Putin starts a two-day visit to India.

news.title: Household bills will rise to fund £28bn investment in energy network
news.summary: Ofgem says the investment will help lower reliance on imported gas and make wholesale energy cheaper.

news.title: Porn site fined £1m over age checks has never responded to Ofcom
news.summary: The regulator tells the BBC it has been emailing AVS Group Ltd without reply since July.

news.title: Cough medicines or lemon and honey – which is better for you?
news.summary: What's the best way to deal with a cough and is lemon and honey as effective as medicine?

news.title: 'A rumbling sound and a loud bang' - small earthquake hits homes in north-west England
news.summary: Lancashire residents say the 3.3-magnitude tremor felt like "an underground explosion", but there are no reports of damage.

news.title: Root hits century as England start second Ashes Test by posting 325-9
news.summary: Joe Root finally makes a century in Australia to keep England afloat on a riveting first day of the second Ashes Test in Brisbane.

news.title: Crypto investor donates record £9m to Reform UK
news.summary: The sum from Christopher Harborne is the largest ever single donation by a living person to a British political party.

news.title: A speeding driver killed my parents - there needs to be a cultural change
news.summary: Claire Corkery wants attitudes to change on road safety after her parents were killed by a speeding driver.
